item.title: [Global][Customer Service] - API Manager Slowdown

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [CA][Control panel] - Manager
item.description:

The situation is back to normal.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 25, 15:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/05/2023 14:43 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud manager (https://ca.ovh.com/manager/) was temporarily unavailable till 25/05/2023 14:53 UTC.
Since 14:53 UTC, the manager is accessible but some services might be unavailable in the manager.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently monitoring the situation
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [EU][Control Panel] - Customer account authentication
item.description:
Apr 28, 10:38 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/04/2023 07:12 UTC
End time : 28/04/2023 10:23 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Apr 28, 10:17 UTC
Update - A mitigation has been applied since 10H06 UTC

Apr 28, 10:15 UTC
Update - 2FA by SMS is temporarily disabled, if you have 2FA by SMS on your account, you can use another 2FA factor if you have configured one, or your backup codes which will have been provided during the activation of the 2FA SMS

Apr 28, 10:13 UTC
Update - 2FA SMS is unreachable.

Apr 28, 10:03 UTC
Update - Connection to the support portal may have some malfunctions.

Apr 28, 08:47 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Apr 28, 08:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/04/2023 07:12 UTC
Service impact : We're currently having a malfunction with the authentication workflow for the customers, customers may hit transient 503 errors from time to time when logging in to the customer panel.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [CA][Support] - Call support
item.description:
Mar 26, 19:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
End Time : 26/03/2023 18:54 UTC
Root cause : A delay on a voice gateway caused the issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 26, 18:54 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : All support numbers are now reachable through English and French language options.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Mar 26, 18:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers who try to contact us through our support numbers (1-855-685-5463 and the Premium number), won't be able to get through our support if they chose the French language option.
Customers will need to choose the English language option to in order to contact our support.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
